title: LARPers
description: Epic fantasy meets real-life adventure!When Matt Taylor accidentally causes the untimely death of his friend Andrew Loewenâ€™s beloved Mages & Monsters character, he attempts to make it up to him by launching a live-action role-playing (LARP) version of the game. While the players set out on an epic campaign to free Milligan Creek from a fictional curse, fantasy and reality come crashing together as outside forces become involved. Little do the kids realize it, but their little adventure could change the face of their small town forever!
author: Kevin Miller
